main moduleÔÉÅ

main.main_process(generate_vs: bool, vs_path: str, context_document_path: str, collection_name: str, embedding_model_name: str, chunk_size: int, chunk_overlap: int, llm_name: str, show_metadata: bool) → bool[source]ÔÉÅ

Orchestrates the main RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline.

This function handles: - Vector Store creation (when needed) - Embedding model loading - Retriever configuration - LLM model initialization - Interactive query execution

Parameters:

  • generate_vs (bool) ‚Äì If True, creates new Vector Store. If False, uses existing one.

  • vs_path (str) ‚Äì Path to store/create the Vector Store.

  • context_document_path (str) ‚Äì PDF document path for embeddings (if generate_vs=True).

  • collection_name (str) ‚Äì ChromaDB collection name.

  • embedding_model_name (str) ‚Äì Embedding model name (e.g., ‚Äúsentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2‚Äù).

  • chunk_size (int) ‚Äì Document chunk size (in tokens).

  • chunk_overlap (int) ‚Äì Chunk overlap size (in tokens).

  • llm_name (str) ‚Äì LLM model name to load (e.g., ‚Äúgemma:2b‚Äù).

  • show_metadata (bool) ‚Äì If True, displays metadata of retrieved documents.

Returns:

True if execution succeeds, False if any error occurs.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

Exception ‚Äì Logs critical errors before returning False.

Example

>>> if __name__ == "__main__":
...     params = {
...         "generate_vs": True,
...         "vs_path": "/path/to/vectorstore",
...         # ... other parameters ...
...     }
...     success = main_process(**params)
...     print("Success:" if success else "Failed:", success)

Note

  • For production use, consider adding input validation

  • ChromaDB persistence depends on vs_path configuration

  • LLM performance depends on proper chunk_size configuration
